Package main.G1HRPS

Class Payment

java.lang.Object
main.G1HRPS.Payment
public class Payment extends Object
Payment class for storing the info of each of the payments.
Author:
Kim Sang Hyeon

  • Constructor Details

    • Payment

      public Payment(UUID payment_id, String guest_id, int room_num, int discounts, int tax, float room_charges, float room_service_charges, float bill_total, PaymentStatus status)
      Payment Constructor.
      Parameters:
      guest_id - Guest ID of guest that made payment
      room_num - Room associated with this payment
      discounts - Discount percentage in the range of (0 - 100)
      tax - Tax on bill total in the range of (0 - 100)
      room_charges - Total room charge of this payment
      room_service_charges - Total room service charge of this payment
      bill_total - After deducting discounts
      status -

    • Payment

  • Method Details

    • GetPaymentID

      public UUID GetPaymentID()
      Gets a unique payment ID of this payment.
      Returns:
      UUID of unique payment ID.

    • SetGuestID

      public void SetGuestID(String guest_id)
      Sets a new guest_id to this payment. Guest with this guest_id has made this payment.
      Parameters:
      guest_id - A string containing guest ID.

    • GetGuestID

      public String GetGuestID()
      Gets a unique guest ID of guest that made payment.
      Returns:
      A string of Guest ID.

    • SetRoomNum

      public void SetRoomNum(int room_num)
      Sets new room number to this payment.
      Parameters:
      room_num - An int of room number.

    • GetRoomNum

      public int GetRoomNum()
      Gets a room number associated with payment.
      Returns:
      An int containing room number.

    • SetDiscountRate

      public void SetDiscountRate(int discount)
      Sets new discount rate (i.e. 25%) to this payment.
      Parameters:
      discount - A int of discount rate.

    • GetDiscountRate

      public int GetDiscountRate()
      Gets a discount rate to be applied to this payment.
      Returns:
      A int containing discount rate of this payment.

    • SetRoomCharges

      public void SetRoomCharges(int days_of_stay, float room_rate)
      Sets new room charge of this payment from the 'rate of room per day' and 'days of stay'.
      Parameters:
      days_of_stay - An int of number of days of stay.
      room_rate - A float of room rate in $.

    • GetRoomCharges

      public float GetRoomCharges()
      Gets a room charge associated with this payment.
      Returns:
      A float of room charge of this payment in $.

    • SetRoomServiceCharges

      public void SetRoomServiceCharges(float room_service_charges)
      Assign new room service charge of this payment.
      Parameters:
      room_service_charges - A float with room service charge of this payment in $.

    • GetRoomServiceCharges

      public float GetRoomServiceCharges()
      Gets total of room service charges associated with this payment.
      Returns:
      A float containing room service charge of this payment.

    • SetTax

      public void SetTax(int tax)
      Gets a new tax rate (i.e. 10%) of this payment.
      Parameters:
      tax - A float of tax rate.

    • GetTax

      public int GetTax()
      Gets a tax rate associated with this payment.
      Returns:
      A float with tax rate of this payment.

    • SetBillTotal

      public void SetBillTotal(float bill_total)
      Sets a new total bill to this payment. Used to overwrite and directly edit the final total payment bill.
      Parameters:
      bill_total - A float containing new total bill.

    • CalculateBillTotal

      private float CalculateBillTotal()
      Sets the total bill amount by adding room charges and room service charges, then calculate the discounted price of their sum, and finally add tax to the final payment amount.
      Returns:
      A float containing total bill of this payment.

    • GetTotalBill

      public float GetTotalBill()
      Gets a total bill of this payment.
      Returns:
      A float with total bill of this payment.

    • SetStatus

      public void SetStatus(PaymentStatus status)
      Sets a new payment status to this payment. It can be set to one of enum types 'Pending', 'Complete', 'Cancelled'.
      Parameters:
      status - PaymentStatus type with a new status of this payment.

    • GetStatus

      public PaymentStatus GetStatus()
      Gets the current status of this payment.
      Returns:
      PaymentStatus type with current status of this payment.
